title: Azure Active Directory: Entra Permissions Management
description: ,CloudKnox Permissions Management is a cloud infrastructure entitlement management (CIEM) solution that provides comprehensive visibility into permissions assigned to all identities like over-privileged workload and user identities, actions, and resources across multi-cloud infrastructures in Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services (AWS), and Google Cloud Platform (GCP). Â CloudKnox Permissions Management detects, automatically right-sizes, and continuously monitors unused and excessive permissions.
